channel.title: Notes on Foo or Phu?
channel.description: Recent content in Notes on Foo or Phu?

item.title: Upgrading to Fedora 31, Scientific edition
item.description: Lately, I have upgraded my Fedora Scientific to version 31. I started using it from version 28 and have had great experiences. This upgrade was not as smooth as previous ones but gave me chances to figure out many things about a Linux system.

item.title: Jekyll slug and data files
item.description: If you haven’t seen it, the markdown file of this post is named “2020-05-12-{{page.slug | replace: ‘’, ‘_’}}.md_”. Why so? What they are A post in Jekyll is the result of parsing a file which is named with the structure

item.title: grubby and BootLoaderSpec - and grubby-deprecated
item.description: My machine running Fedora 30 was upgraded to version 31 on March 21st. When rebooting I got no grub menu and a [fatal error]({{ ‘/posts/upgrade-f31-kde#delcreating-boot-menu-and-booting-updel’ | relative_url }}). This post is about what I have done to resolve this issue.

item.title: Toggle KRunner in Plasma 5.17
item.description: On my Fedora KDE machine, I use KRunner instead of the Application Menu to launch programs, since it can also do other stuff like executing commands, calculating expressions, etc., which is quite convenient.
